effect_entries.effect: Lowers the target's Attack by two stages.
effect_entries.short_effect: Lowers the target's Attack by two stages.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
Sharply lowers the
foe's ATTACK.

Sharply lowers the
foe's ATTACK.

Charms the foe and sharply
reduces its ATTACK.

Charms the foe and sharply
reduces its ATTACK.

The foe is charmed
by the user’s cute
appeals, sharply
cutting its ATTACK.

The user charmingly
stares at the foe,
making it less wary.
The target’s Attack
is sharply lowered.

The user charmingly
stares at the foe,
making it less wary.
The target’s Attack
is sharply lowered.

The user charmingly
stares at the foe,
making it less wary.
The target’s Attack
is sharply lowered.

Le lanceur fait les yeux doux
pour berner l’ennemi et réduire
considérablement son Attaque.

The user gazes at the target rather
charmingly, making it less wary.
The target’s Attack is harshly lowered.

The user gazes at the target rather
charmingly, making it less wary.
The target’s Attack is harshly lowered.

かわいく　みつめて　ゆだんを　さそい
あいての　こうげきを　がくっと　さげる。

귀엽게 바라보고 방심을 유도하여
상대의 공격을 크게 떨어뜨린다.

Le lanceur fait les yeux doux pour berner l’ennemi
et réduire considérablement son Attaque.

Betört das Ziel und reduziert dessen
Angriffs-Wert stark.
Engatusa al objetivo y reduce bastante su Ataque.

Ammalia il bersaglio con lo sguardo per renderlo
meno cauto. Ne riduce molto l’Attacco.

The user gazes at the target rather
charmingly, making it less wary.
This harshly lowers its Attack stat.

かわいく　みつめて　油断を　誘い
相手の　攻撃を　がくっと　さげる。

かわいく　 つめて　ゆだんを　さそい
あいての　こうげきを　がくっと　さげる。

かわいく　みつめて　ゆだんを　さそい
あいての　こうげきを　がくっと　さげる。

귀엽게 바라보고 방심을 유도하여
상대의 공격을 크게 떨어뜨린다.

用撒嬌的眼神
誘使對手疏忽大意，
大幅降低對手的攻擊。

Le lanceur fait les yeux doux pour berner l’ennemi
et beaucoup réduire son Attaque.

Betört das Ziel und reduziert dessen Angriffs-Wert
stark.
Engatusa al objetivo y reduce bastante su Ataque.

Ammalia il bersaglio con lo sguardo per renderlo
meno cauto. Ne riduce molto l’Attacco.

The user gazes at the target rather charmingly,
making it less wary. This harshly lowers its
Attack stat.

かわいく　みつめて　油断を　誘い
相手の　攻撃を　がくっと　さげる。

可爱地凝视，
诱使对手疏忽大意，
从而大幅降低对手的攻击。
